name: Nespresso OriginalLine Variety Pack Capsules
description: Assortment of Nespresso's most popular OriginalLine capsules. Includes various flavors such as Roma, Arpeggio, Livanto, and Ristretto.

name: Nespresso VertuoLine Intenso Coffee Capsules
description: Intense and full-bodied coffee capsules designed for Nespresso's VertuoLine machines. Offers rich flavor and a smooth finish.

name: Nespresso Barista Creations Vanilla Eclair Capsules
description: Indulgent vanilla-flavored coffee capsules inspired by the sweet, creamy taste of vanilla eclairs. Compatible with Nespresso OriginalLine machines.

name: Nespresso VertuoLine Giornio Coffee Capsules
description: Refreshing and aromatic coffee capsules crafted for Nespresso's VertuoLine machines. Perfect for a morning pick-me-up.

name: Nespresso OriginalLine Decaffeinato Capsules
description: Decaffeinated coffee capsules for Nespresso OriginalLine machines. Delivers the same rich flavor and aroma without the caffeine.

name: Nespresso VertuoLine Hazelino Muffin Coffee Capsules
description: Decadent hazelnut-flavored coffee capsules with a hint of pastry-inspired sweetness. Compatible with Nespresso VertuoLine machines.
